title: Digital Visual Content Creation Project for Strengthening English Communication in Scientific Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Daily English communication skills and comprehension of basic scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Targeting science field managers/leaders, the goal is to improve job-integrated practical English proficiency. Provides experience in creating structured content using personal devices and AI tools.

learning_goals: Create three types of digital infographics utilizing 30 specialized science terms.
Produce and present a 2-minute video explaining science experiment procedures using AI tools.
Revise two science data comparison charts based on peer feedback and submit the final output.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
